about_the_game:
Starter Pack : 2000 gold, 10 EXP Scroll2, 50 storage spaces, 50 seal spaces, 3 adventure normal card booster packs.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item.
detailed_description:
Starter Pack : 2000 gold, 10 EXP Scroll2, 50 storage spaces, 50 seal spaces, 3 adventure normal card booster packs.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item.
